description: This notification is sent when MC-LAG oper state changes.
Var binding cienaCesExtAggId represents the MC-LAG PGID.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-EXT-LAG-MIB::cienaCesExtLagMclagStateChange CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-EXT-LAG-MIB::cienaCesExtAggIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-EXT-LAG-MIB::cienaCesExtAggRedundancyState i 1

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The unique identifier allocated to this LAG by
the local system. This attribute identifies an
LAG instance among the subordinate managed
This value is read-only. This object refers to the
variables.name: CIENA-CES-EXT-LAG-MIB::cienaCesExtAggIndex

description: This object specifies the oper state of the MC-LAG node
variables.name: CIENA-CES-EXT-LAG-MIB::cienaCesExtAggRedundancyState
